price: 56. Waxaan dhab ahaan tusnay (Fircoon) calaamooyinkayaga dhammaantood, waase beeniyey oo diiday.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرَيۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad araynāhu āyātinā kullahā fakadhaba wa-abā
